about_the_game:
FAIR WARNING: Only play this game if you have the patience and skill, otherwise it may ruin your day.

Gunning Over It is a frustrating game where you control guns and try to shoot your way up to become a proper hero character (literally)! Fight and shoot your way up a series of obstacles to reach a infamous machine promised to turn you into a normal and generic hero. Inspired by 'Getting Over It!', 'Jump King' and other similar games. You must time your shots and control your momentum to overcome several obstacles in your way. If you fail to do so, you may - lose - everything! Shoot your way through a spooky castle, a crazy circus and icy platforms and find the secret that is hiding in the summit!

Features

  • Highly addictive game loop!
  • Put your reflexes and skills to the test
  • Find and use different guns like Shotguns, Revolvers, Rifles etc.
  • Find and unlock cosmetics and paints
  • Climb your way through Dungeons filled with mini bosses
  • Evil Clowns
  • Ghosts
  • Revolutionary State of the Art 'Gun-Type' game

name: Gunning Over It!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 570 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lower End Hardware is also likely supported but not tested.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-2550K, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 670 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Lower End Hardware is also likely supported but not tested

short_description: Gunning Over It! is a highly frustrating casual game where you play as a gun trying to climb the top of the mountain and overcome fun and challenging obstacles!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
